Spring Framework
  1. org.springframework.messaging.support
  2. HeaderMapper

Uses of Interface
org.springframework.messaging.support.HeaderMapper

Packages that use HeaderMapper
Package
Description
org.springframework.jms.support
This package provides generic JMS support classes, to be used by higher-level classes like JmsTemplate.
org.springframework.messaging.support
Provides implementations of Message along with a MessageBuilder and MessageHeaderAccessor for building and working with messages and message headers, as well as various MessageChannel implementations and channel interceptor support.

  • Uses of HeaderMapper in org.springframework.jms.support

    Subinterfaces of HeaderMapper in org.springframework.jms.support
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    JmsHeaderMapper
    Strategy interface for mapping Message headers to an outbound JMS Message (for example, to configure JMS properties) or extracting messaging header values from an inbound JMS Message.
    Classes in org.springframework.jms.support that implement HeaderMapper
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    SimpleJmsHeaderMapper
    Simple implementation of JmsHeaderMapper.
